thread.title: St. Joe bolts to big lead, cruises past Niles
thread.title_full: St. Joe bolts to big lead, cruises past Niles

title: St. Joe bolts to big lead, cruises past Niles
text:
St. Joe bolts to big lead, cruises past Niles 
ST. JOSEPH — Darius Clayton ran 17 times for 173 yards and three touchdowns, and St. Joseph raced out to a 21-0 lead after the first quarter and cruised to a 59-26 victory over Niles Friday night. 
Clayton scored on runs of five, eight, and 15 yards, and Jake Sremba added 115 yards rushing and a 29-yard touchdown. Chris Cole threw for a pair of touchdowns and Griffin Beaudette added another for the Bears (6-1). Derek Atkins, Jordan Brewer, and Sammy McCoy caught touchdown passes for St. Joseph.
